tool_description:
Epic Games Store - Free Games with details.

Game Name,
Game Description,
Game Image Wide - Tall,
Game Publisher,
Game Discount Price,
Game Original Price,

title: Epic Free Games

api_list.name: Get Epic Free Games
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://epic-free-games.p.rapidapi.com/epic-free-games"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "epic-free-games.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Epic Free Games Coming Soon
